soundmuffler.title: Sound Muffler
soundmuffler.config.min_volume.tooltip: The lowest volume a sound can get muffled to
soundmuffler.config.muffler_range.toolti: The range of the muffler where the minimum volume applies
soundmuffler.config.falloff_range.toolti: The range starting from the muffler range where sound starts falling off
soundmuffler.config.falloff_method.toolt: The method used to modify volume over distance
